document_data.name: Libram of Lathintel
document_data.author: [[Lathintel]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Libram of Lathintel''''' was an [[arcane]] [[spellbook]] penned by the [[wizard]] [[Lathintel]]. It contained sixteen common and unique spells.
document_data.Description: This square tome was a thick maroon-colored volume. Its exterior was covered with tanned leather and it was bound with [[wire]] in six circlets. Each of the sixteen pages held a single spell.
document_data.Powers:
The ''Libram of Lathintel'' contained the following spells:
:''[[Spidereyes]]'' • ''[[Ghost pipes]]'' • ''[[Hover]]'' • ''[[Enlarge]]'' • ''[[Feather fall]]'' • ''[[Light]]'' • ''[[Read magic]]'' • ''[[Sleep]]'' • ''[[Unseen servant]]'' • ''[[Audible glamer]]'' • ''[[Invisibility]]'' • ''[[Locate object]]'' • ''[[Fly]]'' • ''[[Wizard lock]]'' • ''[[Dispel magic]]'' • ''[[Tongues]]''
